00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Text;
00026 using System.Xml;
00027 #endregion
00028 
00029 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.RSD
00030 {
00034     public class APIs
00035     {
00036         #region Constructor
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040         public APIs()
00041         {
00042             APIList = new List<API>();
00043         }
00044 
00049         public APIs(XmlElement Element)
00050         {
00051             APIList = new List<API>();
00052             foreach (XmlNode Children in Element.ChildNodes)
00053             {
00054                 if (Children.Name.Equals("API", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00055                 {
00056                     APIList.Add(new API((XmlElement)Children));
00057                 }
00058             }
00059         }
00060         #endregion
00061 
00062         #region Public Properties
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066         public List<API> APIList { get; set; }
00067 
00068         #endregion
00069 
00070         #region Public Overridden Function
00071 
00076         public override string ToString()
00077         {
00078             try
00079             {
00080                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00081                 Builder.Append("<apis>");
00082                 foreach (API CurrentAPI in APIList)
00083                 {
00084                     Builder.Append(CurrentAPI.ToString());
00085                 }
00086                 Builder.Append("</apis>");
00087                 return Builder.ToString();
00088             }
00089             catch { throw; }
00090         }
00091 
00092         #endregion
00093     }
00094 }
